mapper.insert: insert into bbs(bbsid , usersid , title , boardid , contents , addtime , hits , repnum ) values(#{bbsid} , #{usersid} , #{title} , #{boardid} , #{contents} , #{addtime} , #{hits} , #{repnum} )
mapper.update: update bbs set usersid=#{usersid} , title=#{title} , boardid=#{boardid} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} , hits=#{hits} , repnum=#{repnum} where bbsid=#{bbsid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , b.image , c.boardname from bbs a , users b , board c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.boardid = c.boardid order by bbsid desc
select a.* , b.username , b.image , c.boardname from bbs a , users b , board c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.boardid = c.boardid and bbsid=#{bbsid} order by bbsid desc

select a.* , b.username , b.image , c.boardname from bbs a , users b , board c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.boardid = c.boardid
and b.username like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{usersid}, '%'))
and a.title like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{title}, '%'))
and c.boardname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{boardid}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.hits like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{hits}, '%'))
and a.repnum like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{repnum}, '%'))
